docs.text: CoV Relief is a Canadian-registered not-for-profit organization. Our goal is to provide help and relief for the victims, infected people and affected residents of 2019-nCoV (Wuhan) outbreak.
docs.title: Home

docs.text:
How to donate


Donation can be made by Interac e-Transfer through all major Canadian banks. Please send your donation to donation@covrelief.ca.


We may issue receipt for any donation transaction larger than $10 amount.


To issue an official donation receipt for tax purposes, the following additional information is needed, as per 
CRA requirement
.




Full name, including middle initial


Home address




Please send above information with your transaction reference number to donation@covrelief.ca


All donations will be published below. All expense will be published on "Expense" page.


Donation list


Donation list is updated on weekly basis.


To be updated...

docs.text: Donation can be made by Interac e-Transfer through all major Canadian banks. Please send your donation to donation@covrelief.ca.  We may issue receipt for any donation transaction larger than $10 amount.  To issue an official donation receipt for tax purposes, the following additional information is needed, as per  CRA requirement .   Full name, including middle initial  Home address   Please send above information with your transaction reference number to donation@covrelief.ca  All donations will be published below. All expense will be published on "Expense" page.

docs.text:
Expense


All expense on equipement, supplies and support will be updated here.


Administrative Expense


We try our best to keep the administrative expense as low as possible. Currently, we have the following expenses.


Corporation expenses




Registration fee: $200




IT expenses




Domain: US$17.98


Host: Free


Website: Free


Email: Free




Financial expenses




Account fee: $5/month
